amendment.description: To set aside an amount for procurement of aircrew bladder relief (ABRD) kits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3497 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3497 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S7370; text: CR S7370) To set aside an amount for procurement of aircrew bladder relief (ABRD) kits.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3497 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3497 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy.
